sentences.en: 30 per cent of psychiatric hospital beds are occupied by people of no fixed abode.
sentences.cn: 精神病院30%的床位是被无家可归者占据的。

sentences.en: a homeless person with no fixed abode
sentences.cn: 居无定所的无家可归者

sentences.en: Carrie picked out the new abode because of its newness and bright wood - work.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉选中这套新居,是因为它建筑新颖,木建部分色彩鲜亮.

sentences.en: He's a person of no fixed abode.
He's of no fixed abode and we found him on the streets.
sentences.cn: 他居无定所，我们发现他流落街头。

sentences.en: I went round the streets and found his new abode.
sentences.cn: 我走街串巷找到了他的新住所。

sentences.en: Let me take you to my humble abode!
sentences.cn: 让我带你们到鄙人的寒舍去吧!

sentences.en: Lovejoy, of no fixed abode, was charged with murder.
sentences.cn: 洛夫乔伊, 居无定所, 被控谋杀.

sentences.en: Outsiders who wed islanders are given only three years' right of abode at first.
sentences.cn: 岛外的人和岛民结婚之初只能获得三年的居住权。

sentences.en: The child abode with his grandparents for three years before being returned to his home.
sentences.cn: 那个孩子和祖父母一起居住了三年才回到自己的家里.

sentences.en: The child abode with his grandparents for two years.
sentences.cn: 那个孩子和祖父母一起居住了两年.

sentences.en: The fertile imagination of early times had placed his abode on Mount Olympos in Thessaly.
sentences.cn: 古时候人们想像力极为丰富,认为宙斯住在色萨利的奥林匹斯山上.

sentences.en: The suspect is a person of no fixed abode.
sentences.cn: 嫌疑犯是个居无定所的人.

sentences.en: They still dwelt in their old abode.
sentences.cn: 他们仍然怀念过去的住所.

sentences.en: What a blessing for me should he send Heathcliff to his right abode!
sentences.cn: 如果他把希刺克厉夫送到他应去的地方,这对我来说是一种多么大的幸福啊!

words.tran_cn: 遵守；容忍；继续存在（abide的现在分词）
遵守；停留；忍受（abide的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 住所，公寓，<古>（在某地的）暂住，逗留
容忍( abide的过去式和过去分词 )，等候，逗留，停留
